name: RelIso.coe_one
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
r : α → α → Prop
⊢ Eq (⇑1) id
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_one : ((1 : r ≃r r) : α → α) = id :=
  rfl

name: RelIso.coe_mul
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
r : α → α → Prop
e₁ e₂ : RelIso r r
⊢ Eq (⇑(HMul.hMul e₁ e₂)) (Function.comp ⇑e₁ ⇑e₂)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_mul (e₁ e₂ : r ≃r r) : ((e₁ * e₂) : α → α) = e₁ ∘ e₂ :=
  rfl

name: RelIso.mul_apply
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
r : α → α → Prop
e₁ e₂ : RelIso r r
x : α
⊢ Eq ((HMul.hMul e₁ e₂) x) (e₁ (e₂ x))
decl:
theorem mul_apply (e₁ e₂ : r ≃r r) (x : α) : (e₁ * e₂) x = e₁ (e₂ x) :=
  rfl

name: RelIso.inv_apply_self
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
r : α → α → Prop
e : RelIso r r
x : α
⊢ Eq ((Inv.inv e) (e x)) x
decl:
@[simp]
theorem inv_apply_self (e : r ≃r r) (x) : e⁻¹ (e x) = x :=
  e.symm_apply_apply x

name: RelIso.apply_inv_self
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
r : α → α → Prop
e : RelIso r r
x : α
⊢ Eq (e ((Inv.inv e) x)) x
decl:
@[simp]
theorem apply_inv_self (e : r ≃r r) (x) : e (e⁻¹ x) = x :=
  e.apply_symm_apply x
